publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-3029 Bruce Crawford: Battle of Bannockburn—That the Parliament recognises the heroic efforts and sacrifices made by the 13,000 Scottish freedom fighters who, inspired and led by King Robert the Bruce, defeated 40,000 soldiers under the command of King Edward II to safeguard Scotland’s right to remain an independent nation at the Battle of Bannockburn on 24 June 1314.
S2M-3029 Battle of Bannockburn (lodged on 24 June 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3029 Battle of Bannockburn (lodged on 24 June 2005) Brian Adam*
